bill.title: College Cost Reduction Act
bill.description: To lower the cost of postsecondary education for students and families.

history.action: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 22 - 19.

calendar.description: House Committee on Education and the Workforce Hearing
